lead_paragraph: Evan Lysacek’s performance was so spectacular on Saturday night, he beat second-place finisher Ryan Bradley by more than 19 points and three-time national champion Johnny Weir by 35 points.
snippet: Evan Lysacek’s performance was so spectacular on Saturday night, he beat second-place finisher Ryan Bradley by more than 19 points and three-time national champion Johnny Weir by 35 points.
